mods.abstract: DETAINED IN THE JAIL OF ST. John the Baptist, the negro man HENRY, saying to be th eproperty of Mr. Edwinn Marshall, leaving 4 miles higher than Bayou Sara. The said negro measuring 5 feet 7 inches high, he is about 35 to 40 years old, and he has many teeth out of the upper jaw. He says that he has been employed on bord the steamer [illegible]
